resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81844</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81844</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4764</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spectrometer Adjustments</string>
            <string language="es">Ajustes a un espectrómetro</string>
            <string language="ga">Athruithe Speictriméadair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrometer-Justagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réglages de Spectromètre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ajustes Do Spectrometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Registrazioni Dello Spettrometro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρυθμίσεις φασματομέτρων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Outline of the adjustments required before using a spectrometer. Includes info on why each adjustment is done and the consequences of not carrying out such adjustments.</string>
            <string language="es">Descripción de los ajustes necesarios antes de usar un espectrómetro. Incluye información sobre el motivo por el que se realiza cada ajuste y sobre las consecuencias de no llevar a cabo dichos ajustes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Déan cur síos ar na hathruithe atá riachtanach roimh speictriméadar a úsáid. Áirítear leis eolas maidir leis na fáthanna a dhéantar na hathruithe ar fad agus na hiarmhairtí a bheadh ann mura ndéanfaí na hathruithe sin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
            <string language="es">Física</string>
            <string language="ga">Fisic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umreiß der Justagen benötigt, bevor ein 
Spektrometer verwendet wird. Schließt Info an ein, warum jede 
Justage und die Konsequenzen des Durchführens nicht solcher Justagen 
erfolgt ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contour des réglages requis avant d'utiliser un 
spectromètre. Inclut l'information en fonction pourquoi chaque 
réglage est fait et les conséquences de ne pas effectuer de tels 
réglages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço dos ajustes requeridos antes de usar um 
spectrometer. Inclui o info sobre porque cada ajuste é feito e 
as conseqüências de não realizar tais ajustes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Profilo delle registrazioni richieste prima di 
per mezzo di uno spettrometro. Include l'Info sopra perchè ogni
registrazione è fatta e le conseguenze di avanzamento delle tali 
registrazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίγραμμα των ρυθμίσεων που απαιτούνται πρίν 
χρησιμοποιεί ένα φασματόμετρο. Περιλαμβάνει τις πληροφορίες
επάνω γιατί κάθε ρύθμιση γίνεται και οι συνέπειες της μη 
πραγματοποίησης τέτοιων ρυθμίσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
